noisepp::RidgedMultiModule

noisepp::RidgedMultiModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseRidgedMulti.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::RidgedMultiModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Generates ridged-multifractal noise.
